verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> Now after מ֥וֹת <WH4194> the death מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> of Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> it came to pass that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֔וּן <WH5126> of Nun מְשָׁרֵ֥ת <WH8334> minister מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses' לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדִּ֖י <WH5650> my servant מֵ֑ת <WH4191> is dead וְעַתָּה֩ <WH6258> now ק֨וּם <WH6965> now therefore arise עֲבֹ֜ר <WH5674> go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> this Jordan הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> thou and all this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which I do give לָהֶ֖ם לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to them [even] to the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> Every place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תִּדְרֹ֧ךְ <WH1869> shall tread upon כַּֽף־ <WH3709> that the sole רַגְלְכֶ֛ם <WH7272> of your foot בּ֖וֹ לָכֶ֣ם נְתַתִּ֑יו <WH5414> that have I given כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> unto you as I said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> unto Moses

מֵהַמִּדְבָּר֩ <WH4057> From the wilderness וְהַלְּבָנ֨וֹן <WH3844> and this Lebanon הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> and this וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> far הַנָּהָ֧ר <WH5104> river הַגָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> even unto the great נְהַר־ <WH5104> the river פְּרָ֗ת <WH6578> Euphrates כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> all the land הַֽחִתִּ֔ים <WH2850> of the Hittites וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and unto the great מְב֣וֹא <WH3996> toward the going down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become גְּבוּלְכֶֽם׃ <WH1366> shall be your coast

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> be able to stand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> There shall not any man לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> thee all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <WH2416> of thy life כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> have been עִם־ <WH5973> with מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have been עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> No אַרְפְּךָ֖ <WH7503> [so] I will be with thee I will not fail וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> No אֶעֶזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5800> thee nor forsake

חֲזַ֖ק <WH2388> Be strong וֶאֱמָ֑ץ <WH553> and of a good courage כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תַּנְחִיל֙ <WH5157> shalt thou divide for an inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> for unto this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶֽם׃

רַק֩ <WH7535> but חֲזַ֨ק <WH2388> Only be thou strong וֶֽאֱמַ֜ץ <WH553> courageous מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> and very לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <WH8451> according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which צִוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> which Moses עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant אַל־ <WH408> not תָּס֥וּר <WH5493> thee turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> not from it [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> or [to] the left לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so תַּשְׂכִּ֔יל <WH7919> that thou mayest prosper בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יָמ֡וּשׁ <WH4185> shall not depart סֵפֶר֩ <WH5612> This book הַתּוֹרָ֨ה <WH8451> of the law הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> This מִפִּ֗יךָ <WH6310> out of thy mouth וְהָגִ֤יתָ <WH1897> but thou shalt meditate בּוֹ֙ יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> therein day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> so תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> that thou mayest observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> according to all that is written בּ֑וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> for אָ֛ז <WH227> then תַּצְלִ֥יחַ <WH6743> prosperous אֶת־ <WH853> דְּרָכֶ֖ךָ <WH1870> thy way וְאָ֥ז <WH227> and then תַּשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> and then thou shalt have good success

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not צִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH6680> Have not I commanded חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> thee? Be strong וֶאֱמָ֔ץ <WH553> and of a good courage אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲרֹ֖ץ <WH6206> be not afraid וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחָ֑ת <WH2865> neither be thou dismayed כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go פ
וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Then Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁטְרֵ֥י <WH7860> the officers הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עִבְר֣וּ ׀ <WH5674> Pass בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> through הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> the host וְצַוּ֤וּ <WH6680> and command אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הָכִ֥ינוּ <WH3559> Prepare לָכֶ֖ם צֵידָ֑ה <WH6720> you victuals כִּ֞י <WH3588> for בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> within שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> for within three יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עֹֽבְרִים֙ <WH5674> ye shall pass over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָכֶ֖ם לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> you to possess ס

וְלָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> And to the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and to half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אָמַ֥ר <WH559> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

זָכוֹר֙ <WH2142> Remember אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> you saying יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God מֵנִ֣יחַ <WH5117> hath given you rest לָכֶ֔ם וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and hath given לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> you this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

נְשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <WH802> Your wives טַפְּכֶם֮ <WH2945> your little ones וּמִקְנֵיכֶם֒ <WH4735> and your cattle יֵשְׁב֕וּ <WH3427> shall remain בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave לָכֶ֛ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> which Moses בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> you on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וְאַתֶּם֩ <WH859> you תַּעַבְר֨וּ <WH5674> but ye shall pass חֲמֻשִׁ֜ים <WH2571> armed לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֲחֵיכֶ֗ם <WH251> your brethren כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <WH1368> all the mighty הַחַ֔יִל <WH2428> men of valour וַעֲזַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH5826> and help אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

עַ֠ד <WH5704> until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> rest יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> Until the LORD לַֽאֲחֵיכֶם֮ <WH251> your brethren כָּכֶם֒ וְיָרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> as [he hath given] you and they also have possessed גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָהֶ֑ם וְשַׁבְתֶּ֞ם <WH7725> them then ye shall return לְאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> unto the land יְרֻשַּׁתְכֶם֙ <WH3425> of your possession וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> and enjoy אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָכֶ֗ם מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> it which Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> servant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD'S בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> you on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרַ֥ח <WH4217> east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

וַֽיַּעֲנ֔וּ <WH6030> And they answered אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and whithersoever צִוִּיתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH6680> All that thou commandest נַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> us we will do וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תִּשְׁלָחֵ֖נוּ <WH7971> thou sendest נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> will go

כְּכֹ֤ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> we שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH8085> According as we hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so נִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> in all things so will we hearken אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about רַ֠ק <WH7535> but יִֽהְיֶ֞ה <WH1961> become יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> unto thee only the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> was with מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> be with thee as he was with Moses

כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> Whosoever אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַמְרֶ֣ה <WH4784> [he be] that doth rebel אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֗יךָ <WH6310> against thy commandment וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and does not יִשְׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> and will not hearken אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֛יךָ <WH1697> unto thy words לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תְּצַוֶּ֖נּוּ <WH6680> in all that thou commandest יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> him he shall be put to death רַ֖ק <WH7535> but חֲזַ֥ק <WH2388> only be strong וֶאֱמָֽץ׃ <WH553> and of a good courage פ
